name: Nikki Haley
role: U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations
summary: Former UN Ambassador and South Carolina Governor who ran against Trump in 2024 GOP primary, calling him 'unhinged' and warning he would cause 'chaos' and 'drama.'

keyStatements.quote: Trump is unhinged. He's gotten more unstable and unhinged as this campaign has gone on.
We can't have four more years of chaos, division, and drama. We need a new generation of leadership.
A vote for Trump is a vote for chaos. We know that.

timeline.significance: First female and minority governor of SC

credibility.background: Former UN Ambassador, Governor of South Carolina, daughter of immigrants, 2024 presidential candidate
positions: U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations (2017-2018)
Member, South Carolina House of Representatives (2005-2011)

oppositionReasons: Trump brings chaos, division, and drama
Trump has gotten worse over time
Trump is bad for Republican Party
endorsement: Ran against Trump in 2024 primary; later endorsed him after dropping out
